sender.description: The domain name of the sender of this response (the operator domain name)

receiver.description: The domain name of the receiver of this request (the website)

signature.description:
Signature based on input:
```
sender + '\u2063' +
receiver + '\u2063' +
timestamp + '\u2063' +
preferences.source.signature + '\u2063' +
identifiers[0].source.signature + '\u2063' +
identifiers[1].source.signature + '\u2063' +
...
identifiers[n].source.signature
```
